snippet: The quarterback Robert Griffin III practiced with his teammates but found ways not to answer questions about his status for Sunday’s game.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Washington Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III practices with his team three days after spraining his knee, but remains noncommittal about whether he will play in upcoming game against Cleveland Browns; other football developments noted.
lead_paragraph: The quarterback Robert Griffin III practiced with his teammates but found ways not to answer questions about his status for Sunday’s game.

headline.seo: Griffin and Redskins Cagey About Whether He’ll Play
headline.main: Griffin and Redskins Cagey About Whether He’ll Play
headline.print_headline: Griffin and Redskins Cagey About Whether He’ll Play
